title: What steps are you taking UNICEF?
content:
UNICEF is helping to limit the transmission of the Zika virus and its impact on children and their families, especially in disadvantaged communities. We are working with governments to mobilize communities and get them to protect themselves from infection. We have also launched an appeal for US $ 14 million to meet immediate humanitarian needs of the affected communities.

These funds will be used to help meet those communities almost 200 million people with the information they need to stay safe. You can learn more about our appeal: [http://www.unicef.org/appeals/Zika_response.html][1]

Next article:


   [1]: http://www.unicef.org/appeals/Zika_response.html
